sentences.translation: 米德把该团体称为“激进右翼团体”。

sentences.sentence: On the basis of data furnished by her informants, Mead concluded that adolescents in Samoa had complete sexual freedom.
sentences.translation: 米德根据信息提供者所给的资料，得到的结论是萨摩亚的青少年有完全的性自由。

sentences.sentence: George Herbert Mead said that humans are "talked into" humanity.
sentences.translation: 乔治·赫伯特·米德说，人类是被“说服”成为人类的。
